text.section: If the State finds that a person has violated or is violating § 2-602(a) of this subtitle, the State may file a civil action in a court of competent jurisdiction within the State against the person.

In filing a civil action under this section, the State may seek:
The penalties provided under § 2-602(b) of this subtitle; and
Subject to the guidelines set forth in § 2-605(a)(4) of this subtitle, court costs and attorney's fees.
